channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India startup funding hits $11B in 2025 as investors grow more selective
item.description: Startup funding rounds in India fell sharply in 2025 as investors concentrated capital into fewer companies.

item.title: Best Apple Watch apps for boosting your productivity
item.description: Although the Apple Watch comes with simple built-in productivity apps like Reminders and Calendar, it’s worth exploring some third-party apps that are...

item.title: FaZe Clan’s future is uncertain after influencers depart
item.description: Six influencers recently announced that they are leaving esports group FaZe Clan following unsuccessful contract negotiations with new management.

item.title: The Best After-Christmas Deals on Gear We've Tested (2025)
item.description: Money gifts burning a hole in your pocket? These deals on WIRED-tested gadgets and gizmos will stretch your dollars.
